
# ROC

```{r roc}
m <- list(
    MELD = timeROC_MELD,
    "MELD-Na" = timeROC_MELDNa,
    "MELD-Plus7" = timeROC_MELDPlus7,
    RCV = timeROC_RCV,
    ARCV = timeROC_ARCV
)
plot_surv_roc(m, timepoint = 90)
plot_surv_roc_trend(m)
```
